Package exceptions

Class PizzaFormatException

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Throwable
java.lang.Exception
exceptions.PizzaFormatException
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class PizzaFormatException extends Exception
Exception thrown when an error is thrown while parsing the text file using MenuLoader.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • PizzaFormatException

      public PizzaFormatException(String message, int lineNum)
      Constructs a PizzaFormatException that contains a helpful detail message explaining why the exception occurred.

      Important: do not write JUnit tests that expect a valid implementation of the assignment to have a certain error message, as the official solution will use different messages to those you are expecting, if any at all.

      Parameters:
      message - message to be displayed
      lineNum - int line number of error

    • PizzaFormatException

      public PizzaFormatException(String message, int lineNum, Throwable cause)
      Constructs a PizzaFormatException that contains a helpful detail message explaining why the exception occurred.

      Important: do not write JUnit tests that expect a valid implementation of the assignment to have a certain error message, as the official solution will use different messages to those you are expecting, if any at all.

      Parameters:
      message - message to be displayed
      lineNum - int line number of error
      cause - throwable that caused this exception

    • PizzaFormatException

      public PizzaFormatException(String message, int lineNum, int debugCode)
      Constructs a PizzaFormatException that contains a helpful detail message explaining why the exception occurred. Additionally, the debug code defined in the the MenuLoader anonymous class named Because is supplied the error message.

      Important: do not write JUnit tests that expect a valid implementation of the assignment to have a certain error message, as the official solution will use different messages to those you are expecting, if any at all.

      Parameters:
      message - message to be displayed
      lineNum - int line number of error
      debugCode - int provided by MenuLoader anonymous helper class called Because containing constant static debug variable integer values, used for understanding
